title: Several injured in shooting near after-hours club
content:
Toledo police are investigating an early morning fight that injured multiple people at Junction and Belmont avenues.
Police were called at about 3:30 a.m. today to a parking lot near an after-hours club on the report of shots fired and a large disturbance. One of the officers who worked the scene, Sgt. Kevin Korsog, could not confirm the number, type, or severity of injuries later today.
“We’re still trying to gather all the information,” he said. “This seemed like a pretty good melee.”
He said several people from the large crowd were taken to local hospitals. Police do not yet know what started the fight, and are conducting interviews today as the investigation continues.
